mahanuwara shri dalada maligawe diyawadana nilame washayen nawatha warak thora path kara ganima sandaha wishala washayen allas dun bawata chodana ella wi sitina pradip nilanga dala bandara theri path wima sambandha prashnaya me wanawita janadhipathiwaraya wetha yomu keri athi bawa wartha we.

lingika adhyapanaya yanu kunuharupayak nowana bawa apa mulin therum gatha yuthuwa thibe.lingika adhyapanaya pasal adhyapanayata athulath kirima pinisa uthsaha kala sama awasthawakama apa kale sarpayage bada madden alla ganna se ema wadapiliwele waradi thanin alla ganimaya.bada madden alla gath pasu sarpaya hari athasapa kanna se lingika adhyapanaya pasal lamunta labadima pinisa gath uthsahayanda wyarthawa giye eewa karannata uthsaha kala piris samajaya thula barapathala wiwechanayanta lakwimen anathuruwaya.mema wadapiliwela diyath kala yuthu wanne merata sanskruthiyata anugathawaya.batahira ratawal me sambandhayen anugamanaya karanu labana kriyawaliya epariddenma merata thula kriyathmaka kala nohakiya.bududahama ha bandi pawathina merata sanskruthiya thula lingika karana elipita katha nokarana bawa apa mulin therum gatha yuthuwa thibe.ema sadacharaya ha hadiyawa apata sanskruthiyen urumawu deyaki.eyata abhiyoga kirimata yama anuwana kamaki.ese kiya mema adhyapanaya bahara kara iwatha limada moda kamaki.homona kriyakarithwaye aduwadi wim samanga shariraye siduwana wenas kam pilibanda unandu wana daruwa eeta hethu boho wita asa dana ganne mawagen ho piyageni.mapiya dudaru sabandatha etharam kittu nowana wita daruwa wadihiti ayeku gen eya dana ganimata unandu weyi.mawa ha piya harunu wita mema karunu asa dana ganimata sitina hondama pudgalaya guruwarayaya.pasala thula eeta idak nomathi wuwahoth daruwa thama kuthuhalaya nathi kara ganimata boho wita upayogi karaganu labanne demawpiyan hara sesu kandayam walin ekak ho kihipayaki.mehidi daruwata niwaradi de awashyaya pramanayata pamanak kiya dewi yayi sahathika wiya nohakiya.antharjalayada me aakaraya.ehi honda ho naraka thiranaya wanne bhawitha karannage kriyakalapaya ha aakalpa mathaya.pasal wishayak lesa lingika adhyapanaya aniwaryayenma katha kala yuthu mathrukawak bawata pathwanne mema pasubima thulaya.
ewani yuga purushayeku samaga tika welawak ho kathabas kirimata labimath mage bhagyayak lesa salakanawa.

emenma praharaya sambandhayen shri lankawa sidukarana parikshanawalata sahaya wana lesa siyalu ratawalin illa sitina bawada emagin nikuth kala niwedanaye sadahan.merata siduwu maragena marena bomba prahara pilibada sidukerena parikshana katayuthuwalata sahayawima sandaha intapol hewath jathyanthara polisiya wisin kandayamak anuyuktha kara thibenawa.

kohoma unath ape rate pawathina adhyapana kramawedayanam asarthakayi.mama ehema kiyanne guruwarayek lesa labana athdakimuth ekka.katapadamin kiyana giraw hadana kramawedayak misa aakalpa sanwardhanaya wana,kusalatha wardhanaya wena,abhiyoga jayaganna puluwan hakiyawan opananwana kramayak nemeyi meka.ee nisayi usas adhyapanaya labuwath pasugami chinthanayaka jiwath wena pirisak ape rate inne.jarman giya mage yaluwek kiyapu deyak thamayi ehe sisun igena ganna athare wiwidha wruththin walath yedena bawa.samaharu paya dekak paththara wikunanawa.hotel wala wetar wada karanawa.ee kisima rukiyawak pahathya kiyala salakanneth na.ee siyalu rukiya magin yam kisi sewayak laba denawa kiyalayi owun kiyanne.
